comments.author: mozillamonks@yahoo.ca
comments.raw_text:
MozNetwork.org and MozNetwork.com (the .org sadly not in my possession) were created back in the days of SFX 1, and were comparable to the Planet Mozilla we have today.

The sites old logo was here, http://www.flickr.com/photos/factoryjoe/7745192/ .

If you guys are willing to take on the domain, I'll gladly transfer it to you pro bono; I have no uses for it and it's just costing money to renew.
comments.creator: mozillamonks@yahoo.ca
comments.text:
MozNetwork.org and MozNetwork.com (the .org sadly not in my possession) were created back in the days of SFX 1, and were comparable to the Planet Mozilla we have today.

The sites old logo was here, http://www.flickr.com/photos/factoryjoe/7745192/ .

If you guys are willing to take on the domain, I'll gladly transfer it to you pro bono; I have no uses for it and it's just costing money to renew.

Also, I have the .org still as well, apparently at namecheap.com -- so, you can have both moznetwork.org and moznetwork.com if you wanted them.

/Robin
comments.creator: mozillamonks@yahoo.ca
